comments: This term, she has been using reserve or online readings. She always asks if everything was clear in class and will explain every point to the point of satisfaction despite her light Italian accent. She is very friendly and goes above and beyond her duty to make sure that she is available to her students.

A bad mark from Chiara means that you had put in zero effort into reading the text and had no appreciation for real world experiences. The text was difficult but if you went to the effort to ask for help Chiara would bend over backwards to clarify. Doing the readings and grammatically well papers guaranteed a high mark.

Chiara is one of the best prof\'s I have honestly had at UVic! she is very easy to talk with and was always available if help was needed. She is a very fair marker and is very clear in her lecture notes. I found her to be a very intelligent and a nice person. I would def recommend Poli Sci 348 to be taken with Chiara!

Great knowledge of the course material and lots of interesting life experience to draw on as well. Really helpful and approachable in class and outside of class. If you put in the effort she\'ll make it worthwhile.

Underprepared, text had nothing to do with class, lectures messy and unstructured, an insufficient knowledge of subject, uses examples that are inconsistent with tenets of theory, blatant lack of professionalism, inability to ensure that readings on reserve available, and can barely speak English.
